import { useState } from 'react' import './AddOn.css' function AddOn({ state, dispatch }) { const [toggle, setToggle] = useState({ online: false, storage: false, profile:false }) function handleOnline() { setToggle({ online: !toggle.online }) toggle.online? dispatch({type:"OnlineCheckAddOn"}):console.log("hi") } return (
